Author: The Combat Reborn Team
Name: GatherBuddy Reborn
Description: Adds commands to simplify gathering by finding nodes and fish and their locations via item name and a UI to keep track of special uptime and weather conditions. Also automatically gathers items based on these conditions using lists that you specify. Automated gathering requires vnavmesh.
Punchline: Simplify Gathering and Fishing to the extreme.
Changelog:
## What's Changed
* Navigation improvements by @lazyranma in https://github.com/FFXIV-CombatReborn/GatherBuddyReborn/pull/236
* Bump DalamudApiLevel to 11 by @phecdaDia in https://github.com/FFXIV-CombatReborn/GatherBuddyReborn/pull/237
* 7.1 update part 4 (from GatherBuddy) by @lazyranma in https://github.com/FFXIV-CombatReborn/GatherBuddyReborn/pull/238
* Workaround for race condition in vnavmesh IPC by @lazyranma in https://github.com/FFXIV-CombatReborn/GatherBuddyReborn/pull/241


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/FFXIV-CombatReborn/GatherBuddyReborn/compare/7.2.2.7...7.2.2.8
